title: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not update immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the label settings.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the label height remains the same, even though the font size has changed.
OB: The label height does not change in the UI after modifying the font size.
EB: The label content should adjust its height to be appropriate for the modified font size.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the label settings.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the label height does not change to match the new font size.
